::Zardus::

Zardus watches the ground scroll by beneath him, and then looks over 
at the scanners. They were over India right now, a ship being detected 
in the dense forests.

"Do any of you remember of any ship crashing in India?" he asks the tw 
o Alliance members with him in the shuttle, guiding the shuttle toward 
the crashed ship.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> The shuttle lifts off, and Zardus guides it out of the docking bay 
and toward eastern asia, scanning for any material while he flies.
